7.6 The DATE module

decode-duration

Sealed method

Summary

Decodes a year/month duration into its constituent parts.

Signature

decode-duration duration => years months

Arguments

duration
An instance of <year/month-duration>.

Values

years
An instance of <integer>.

months
An instance of <integer>.

Library

system

Module

date

Description

Decodes an instance of <year/month-duration> into its constituent parts.

See also

decode-duration, page 145

decode-duration, page 146

encode-year/month-duration, page 149

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
